page.title: 17Entertainment_Public House
page.content: {Barmeals.}The Horse Shoe Inn in Hunmanby is run by Mr.Emmerson. The pub serves barmeals.You could have sirloin steak,salad and chips or just a sandwich.You could have wine, bitter, beer or coffee with your meal {Bar and Lounge.}The bar is used mainly by men that have come for a game of darts or dominoes.The lounge is mainly used by couples,young and old,that just come for a drink or a meal. Children usually just go in one room if they come with their parents.The lounge is more of a homely place with four to six seats round each table. {Stock.}The average pub uses about 5 scotch bitter barrels each week containing 36 gallons,2 barrels of number 3 which contain 22 gallons and 1 barrel of lager which contains 36 gallons.The drinks are delivered every thursday.
